_instructions: 1. Copy a profile from profiles/ folder OR customize below. 2. Save to config.json in your config directory.
_profiles_available: See profiles/ folder for ready-to-use templates: software-engineering, seo-digital-marketing, product-management, ux-design, data-science, sales-business-dev, hr-recruiting, finance-accounting, project-operations, content-copywriting, cybersecurity
_security_note: IMPORTANT: Passwords and API tokens are stored in OS keyring (v2.0+), NOT in this file. Configure credentials in Settings UI.
_title_allowlist_help: Job titles you want to see. Be inclusive - add variations like 'Manager', 'Lead', 'Senior', 'Director' versions.
_title_blocklist_help: Job titles to always skip. Common: Intern, Junior (if you're senior), specific industries you don't want.
_keywords_boost_help: Skills, tools, technologies you know. Jobs matching these score higher.
_keywords_exclude_help: Red flags to auto-reject jobs. Add deal-breakers here.
_company_whitelist_help: Preferred companies get 50% scoring bonus. Fuzzy matching handles 'Inc', 'LLC', etc.
_company_blacklist_help: Blocked companies get 0 score. Takes precedence over whitelist.
_location_help: Set allow_onsite to true and add cities/states if you want local jobs.
_salary_help: Minimum acceptable salary. Set to 0 to see all jobs regardless of salary.
_threshold_help: Jobs scoring above this (0.0-1.0) trigger immediate notifications. Lower = more alerts.

alerts._note: Webhook URLs and passwords are stored in OS keyring, not here. Configure via Settings UI.
